<div class="page-content">
<style>
            .hero-panel .hero-panel__image {
                background-image: url(/-/scassets/images/org/research/research-hero-mobile.jpg);
            }
            @media (min-width: 600px) {
                .hero-panel .hero-panel__image {
                    background-image: url(/-/scassets/images/org/research/research-hero-small.jpg);
                }
            }
        </style>
<section class="hero-panel hero--hasDesktopImage hero--hasMobileImage">
<div class="hero-panel_image-wrapper">
<div class="hero-panel__image  "></div>
</div>
<div class="container">
<div class="hero-panel__text hero-panel__text--bottom">
<h1 class="hero-panel__title">Research</h1>
<div class="hero-panel__subtitle">Cleveland Clinic focuses cutting-edge research on the characterization, diagnosis, and treatment of a broad spectrum of diseases and conditions. Learn how Cleveland Clinic caregivers pursue the guiding principle of ‘Patients First’ by improving patient care through research.</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="highlight-panel">
<div id="df0c7a47-219b-41ec-bc6c-551e76d5d3ce" class="container">
<div class="highlight-panel__media l-2col--1">
<img src="./Research &amp; Innovations _ Cleveland Clinic_files/research-pop-panel.jpg" alt="Otto Glasser, MD, invented a way of accurately measuring the radiation doses being given to patients during what was then called Roentgen ray therapy (radiotherapy for cancer). The groundbreaking device was called a dosimeter." class="highlight-panel__image">
</div>
<div class="highlight-panel__content l-2col--2">
<h2 class="title">The Future of Healthcare and Research Since 1921</h2>
<div class="highlight-panel__rtc"><p>Since its <a href="https://my.clevelandclinic.org/about/history">founding in 1921</a>, research has been an integral part of Cleveland Clinic’s mission. The founders believed it was not only important to treat patients, but also to investigate the causes of disease. A century later, Cleveland Clinic is at the forefront of scientific discovery. Our researchers are leaders in growing fields transforming the way medicine is delivered, including precision medicine, genomics, population health and immuno-oncology. </p>
<p>Lab-based and translational researchers work to uncover novel biological pathways that contribute to a host of diseases, including cancer, cardiovascular and metabolic diseases, brain and eye diseases, and diseases of the inflammation and immune systems. They work closely with clinical researchers from all areas of Cleveland Clinic to translate basic biological research discoveries into new diagnostic tests and treatments—including medical devices and therapeutics—that will benefit patients worldwide.</p>
<p><em>Pictured: One of the first instances of ground-breaking research at Cleveland Clinic beginning during the 1920's. Otto Glasser, MD, invented a way of accurately measuring the radiation doses being given to patients during what was then called Roentgen ray therapy (radiotherapy for cancer). The groundbreaking device was called a dosimeter.</em></p></div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="highlight-panel bg-gray">
<div id="b618969d-5c92-4b05-81df-4cba5d87dc79" class="container">
<div class="highlight-panel__media l-2col--1 push">
<img src="./Research &amp; Innovations _ Cleveland Clinic_files/ohio-innovations-panel.jpg" alt="Dr. Jung discusses research with colleague" class="highlight-panel__image">
</div>
<div class="highlight-panel__content l-2col--2 pull">
<h2 class="title">Ohio Invests in Our Future</h2>
<div class="highlight-panel__rtc"><p>In partnership with the State of Ohio and <a href="https://www.jobsohio.com/" target="_blank">JobsOhio</a>, Cleveland Clinic has launched the <a href="https://www.lerner.ccf.org/pathogen-research/" target="_blank">Global Center for Pathogen Research &amp; Human Health</a> to study present and future pandemic threats and to develop novel diagnostic tests, vaccines and treatments. The $500M center ($200M from Ohio, $300M from Cleveland Clinic) will expand upon Cleveland Clinic’s existing programs and expertise in immunological research, with newly recruited world leaders in immunology and pathogen research as well as technology development and education.</p>
<p>The center is part of Ohio’s $1B investment in Northeast Ohio to create the Cleveland Innovation District — a biomedical hub that will drive economic growth and lead to improved health for Ohioans and patients around the globe. As part of the Innovation District, Cleveland Clinic will join Case Western Reserve University, Cleveland State University, MetroHealth, and University Hospitals. In addition to a focus on research and development, the center is expected to generate 8,500 jobs in Ohio.</p></div>
<div class="highlight-panel__links">
<a href="https://newsroom.clevelandclinic.org/2021/01/25/through-a-500-million-partnership-with-the-state-of-ohio-jobsohio-and-ohio-development-services-agency-cleveland-clinic-forms-global-center-for-pathogen-research-human-health/" class="btn-rd btn-rd--primary" target="_blank">Read the Announcement</a>
<a href="https://www.lerner.ccf.org/pathogen-research/" class="btn-rd btn-rd--secondary" target="_blank">Learn More About Our Research</a> </div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="call-to-action call-to-action-small theme-white teaser-panel">
<a class="accordion-section-title js-accordion-section-title js-pre-open active" href="https://my.clevelandclinic.org/research#6BFD7E41-D061-47EF-BA12-D88CF386688A" style="display: none;">Cleveland Clinic Research Centers &amp; Institutes</a>
<div id="6BFD7E41-D061-47EF-BA12-D88CF386688A" class="container content-pad accordion-content js-accordion-content open">
<h2 class="section__heading lede section__heading--centered">
Cleveland Clinic Research Centers &amp; Institutes </h2>
<div class="panel-row">
<div class="  l-4col--1">
<a href="https://www.lerner.ccf.org/" target="_blank">
<div class="call-to-action__image">
<img src="./Research &amp; Innovations _ Cleveland Clinic_files/lerner-research-teaser.jpg" alt="Cleveland Clinic Lerner Research Institute Logo" width="430" height="242">
</div>
<h3 class="call-to-action__title lede ">
Lerner Research Institute
</h3>
</a>
<div class="call-to-action__text ">
<p>
Home to all laboratory-based, translational and clinical research at Cleveland Clinic. Our mission is to understand the underlying causes of human diseases and to develop new treatments and cures. </p>
</div>
<a href="https://www.lerner.ccf.org/" class="bold-link" target="_blank">Visit Lerner Research Institute</a> </div>
<div class="  l-4col--2">
<a href="https://my.clevelandclinic.org/departments/biorepository">
<div class="call-to-action__image">
<img src="./Research &amp; Innovations _ Cleveland Clinic_files/biorepository-rendering.jpg" alt="Cleveland Clinic&#39;s BioRepository" width="600" height="338">
</div>
<h3 class="call-to-action__title lede ">
CC-BioR
</h3>
</a>
<div class="call-to-action__text ">
<p>
Cleveland Clinic’s BioRepository collects and stores biological samples and associated health information to be used for medical research. </p>
</div>
<a href="https://my.clevelandclinic.org/departments/biorepository" class="bold-link">Visit BioRepository</a> </div>
<div class="  l-4col--3">
<a href="https://my.clevelandclinic.org/research/computational-life-sciences">
<div class="call-to-action__image">
<img src="./Research &amp; Innovations _ Cleveland Clinic_files/ccls-teaser-panel.jpg" alt="IBM Quantum System One" width="430" height="242">
</div>
<h3 class="call-to-action__title lede ">
Center for Computational Life Sciences
</h3>
</a>
<div class="call-to-action__text ">
<p>
Using the collective data of millions, Cleveland Clinic's Center for Computational Life Sciences is developing better care for individuals using state-of-the-art resources and facilities. </p>
</div>
<a href="https://my.clevelandclinic.org/research/computational-life-sciences" class="bold-link"> <span class="call-to-action__small">Visit Computational Life Sciences</span>
<span class="call-to-action__large">Visit Computational Life Sciences</span>
</a> </div>
<div class="  l-4col--4">
<a href="https://my.clevelandclinic.org/research/c5research">
<div class="call-to-action__image">
<img src="./Research &amp; Innovations _ Cleveland Clinic_files/c5research-teaser.jpg" alt="Cleveland Clinic Coordinating Center for Clinical Research Logo" width="430" height="242">
</div>
<h3 class="call-to-action__title lede ">
C5Research
</h3>
</a>
<div class="call-to-action__text ">
<p>
Cleveland Clinic Coordinating Center for Clinical Research is Cleveland Clinic's academic coordinating center providing an academic focus to the design, planning and management of clinical trials. </p>
</div>
<a href="https://my.clevelandclinic.org/research/c5research" class="bold-link">Visit C5Research</a> </div>
</div>
<div class="panel-row">
<div class="  l-4col--1">
<a href="https://my.clevelandclinic.org/research/neurological">
<div class="call-to-action__image">
<img src="./Research &amp; Innovations _ Cleveland Clinic_files/ni-research-teaser.jpg" alt="Cleveland Clinic Neurological Institute Logo" width="430" height="242">
</div>
<h3 class="call-to-action__title lede ">
Neurological Institute Research Programs
</h3>
</a>
<div class="call-to-action__text ">
<p>
Conducting innovative and collaborative clinical research to understand neurological disease and to translate research results into best practices in the care of patients with cognitive, motor, or behavioral challenges. </p>
</div>
<a href="https://my.clevelandclinic.org/research/neurological" class="bold-link">View Neurological Research Programs</a> </div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="highlight-panel bg-gray">
<div id="23f470c6-2522-4fad-a641-5eb14603e70c" class="container">
<div class="highlight-panel__media l-2col--1">
<img src="./Research &amp; Innovations _ Cleveland Clinic_files/nursing-research.png" alt="nursing research illustration" class="highlight-panel__image">
</div>
<div class="highlight-panel__content l-2col--2">
<h2 class="title">Interested in Nursing Research?</h2>
<p class="subtitle">Cleveland Clinic's Office of Nursing Research and Innovation can help</p>
<div class="highlight-panel__rtc"><p>The Office of Nursing Research and Innovation encourages any nurse who has a research question, an idea for a research study, or an innovative process, system or device to come forward and pursue their ideas. Oftentimes, the most important ideas for research are those generated by clinicians who provide direct patient care.</p>
<p>Benefits of Nursing Research:</p>
<ul>
<li>Brings improvements to nursing practice.</li>
<li>Provides best practices for nurses and patients.</li>
<li>Enhances patient advocacy.</li>
<li>Advances the foundation of nursing science so it can be used by other nurses.</li>
</ul>
<p>Discover the power you have to transform nursing practice. Learn more about our nursing research and innovation programs today!</p></div>
<div class="highlight-panel__links">
<a href="https://my.clevelandclinic.org/departments/nursing/about/specialties/nursing-research" class="btn-rd btn-rd--primary">Visit Office of Nursing Research &amp; Innovation</a>
<a href="https://consultqd.clevelandclinic.org/nursing-research-infographic/" class="btn-rd btn-rd--secondary" target="_blank">Why Nursing Research Is Important</a> </div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="call-to-action-center call-to-action-center--image theme-blue-gray-pattern" style="background-image: url(&#39;/-/scassets/images/org/research/power-of-ribbon.jpg&#39;);">
<a class="accordion-section-title js-accordion-section-title js-pre-open active" href="https://my.clevelandclinic.org/research#1b1b1016-3a0f-42b1-94b0-94fcebfb4ea5" style="display: none;">Want To Support Ground-Breaking Research at Cleveland Clinic?</a>
<div class="container content-pad accordion-content js-accordion-content open" id="1b1b1016-3a0f-42b1-94b0-94fcebfb4ea5">
<div class="l-1col">
<h2 class="call-to-action-center__heading lede">Want To Support Ground-Breaking Research at Cleveland Clinic?</h2> </div>
<div class="l-1col call-to-action-center__content">
<h4 class="call-to-action-center__subheading">Discover how you can help Cleveland Clinic save lives and continue to lead the transformation of healthcare.</h4> <a href="https://my.clevelandclinic.org/giving" class="button--secondary button--arrow">Give to Cleveland Clinic</a> </div>
</div>
</section>

                {{#posts}}
                <div class="teaser__item js-teaser__item l-4col">
                    <article class="teaser teaser--news teaser--image">

f=t.target.replace("list","section");jQuery(f).hide()}r()}}t.endpoints.forEach(function(t){var t.filters)switch(r){case"physicians-NPI":case"institutes-objectID":e+="&"+r+"="+t.filters[r];break;default:e+="&"+r+"="+t.filters[r]}o.get(e).then(function(t){f(t)}).catch(function(t){t instanceof  * @overview es6-promise - a tiny implementation of Promises/A+.

 * mustache.js - Logic-less {{mustache}} templates with JavaScript

 * mustache.js - Logic-less {{mustache}} templates with JavaScript

E(t){if("string"==typeof t&&(t=t.split(p,2)),!r(t)||2!==t.length)throw new Error("Invalid tags: "+t);i=new RegExp(o(t[0])+"\\s*"),s=new RegExp("\\s*"+o(t[1])),u=new r}(function(t){for(var e,r,n=[],o=0,i=t.length;o<i;++o)(e=t[o])&&("text"===e[0]&&r&&"text"===r[0]?(r[1]+=e[1],r[3]=e[3]):(n.push(e),r=e));return n}(v))}(e,n)),s},m.prototype.render=function(t,e,r){var n=this.parse(t),o=e instanceof v?e:new v(e);return this.renderTokens(n,o,r,t)},m.prototype.renderTokens=function(t,e,r,n){for(var o,i,s,u="",a=0,c=t.length;a<c;++a)s=void 0,"#"===(i=(o=t[a])[0])?s=this.renderSection(o,e,r,n):"^"===i?s=this.renderInverted(o,e,r,n):">"===i?s=this.renderPartial(o,e,r,n):"&"===i?s=this.unescapedValue(o,e):"name"===i?s=this.escapedValue(o,e):"text"===i&&(s=this.rawValue(o)),void 0!==s&&(u+=s);return u},m.prototype.renderSection=function(t,e,o,i){var s=this,u="",a=e.lookup(t[1]);if(a){if(r(a))for(var c=0,f=a.length;c<f;++c)u+=this.renderTokens(t[4],e.push(a[c]),o,i);else original template");null!=(a=a.call(e.view,i.slice(t[3],t[5]),function(t){return s.render(t,e,o)}))&&(u+=a)}else u+=this.renderTokens(t[4],e,o,i);return u}},m.prototype.renderInverted=function(t,e,n,o){var i=e.lookup(t[1]);if(!i||r(i)&&0===i.length)return this.renderTokens(t[4],e,n,o)},m.prototype.renderPartial=function(t,e,r){if(r){var o=n(r)?r(t[1]):r[t[1]];return null!=o?this.renderTokens(this.parse(o),e,r,o):void 0}},m.prototype.unescapedValue=function(t,e){var r=e.lookup(t[1]);if(null!=r)return r},m.prototype.escapedValue=function(e,r){var n=r.lookup(e[1]);if(null!=n)return t.escape(n)},m.prototype.rawValue=function(t){return t[1]},t.name="mustache.js",t.version="2.3.2",t.tags=["{{","}}"];var w=new m;return t.clearCache=function(){return w.clearCache()},t.parse=function(t,e){return w.parse(t,e)},t.render=function(t,e,n){if("string"!=typeof t)throw new TypeError('Invalid template! Template should be a "string" but "'+function(t){return r(t)?"array":typeof t}(t)+'" was given as the first argument for mustache#render(template, view, partials)');return w.render(t,e,n)},t.to_html=function(e,r,o,i){var s=t.render(e,r,o);if(!n(i))return s;i(s)},t.escape=function(t){return String(t).replace(/[&<>"'`=\/]/g,function(t){return c[t]})},t.Scanner=y,t.Context=v,t.Writer=m,t})},function(t,e){t.exports=function(t,e){var r={posts:[]};if(!t)throw Error("ccWp: Wordpress data must be provided for parsing");if(Array.isArray(t)&&0===t.length)throw Error("ccWp: data from the server is empty array; something is wrong");for(var n=0,o=0;o<t.length;o++){var i=t[o],s={};if(i.title&&""!==i.title.rendered&&i.excerpt&&""!==i.excerpt.rendered&&i.link&&""!==i.link){s.date=i.date,s.title=i.title.rendered,s.excerpt=i.excerpt.rendered,s.link=i.link,s.mediumImage="";try{s.mediumImage=i._embedded["wp:featuredmedia"][0].media_details.sizes.medium.source_url}catch(t){}if(r.posts.push(s),++n>=e)break}}return r}}]);
//# sourceMappingURL=ccWpBundle.js.map;
                </script>

                    target: '5aadd8d1b6e242da97fc850bd74698f0',

                            newsroom: 'https://newsroom.clevelandclinic.org'
                        }
                    };

                $(document).ready(function() {
                    window.newsPanelController(configuration);
                });
